String text = command.substring(5);
yell(playerName +"p2.username"+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

item.title: L00k
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Use this.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator == 1) && (playerRights<=1)){ yell("[Donator] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==0){ yell("[Player] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights == 1){ yell("[Moderator] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights == 2){ yell("[Administrator] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if (playerRights == 3){ yell("[Owner] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
